title: Introduction to DSA
videoScript:
Welcome to Programmer‚Äôs Picnic! In Lesson 1, we're starting with the fundamentals of Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). By the end of this session, you will understand what DSA actually means, where it shows up in real life and why interviewers love it.

Take notes and feel free to pause and try the code! Let‚Äôs begin.
blogArticle:
## Lesson 1: Introduction to DSA

Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) form the backbone of efficient programming.

### Why DSA?
- Makes your solutions faster
- Improves memory usage
- Helps crack interviews & competitive programming

### Core Concepts
- **Data Structure**: A way to organize data
- **Algorithm**: A procedure to solve a problem optimally

### Real-Life Example
Phone contact list = data structure
Binary search on sorted names = algorithm

Welcome to the world of smart programming! üöÄ
practiceProblems: Explain DSA in your own words with a real-life example.
Why do companies expect candidates to know DSA?
What is the difference between a data structure and an algorithm?
homework: Find 5 daily life examples of data structures.
Write a short note: Where do algorithms help in real applications?
Try a beginner DSA problem on LeetCode.

quiz.question: Which one is a data structure?

print("Write your code here...")
